BatchGetNamedQuery.name: BatchGetNamedQuery
BatchGetNamedQuery.description: Grants permissions to get information about one or more named queries

BatchGetQueryExecution.name: BatchGetQueryExecution
BatchGetQueryExecution.description: Grants permissions to get information about one or more query executions

CreateDataCatalog.name: CreateDataCatalog
CreateDataCatalog.description: Grants permissions to create a datacatalog

CreateNamedQuery.name: CreateNamedQuery
CreateNamedQuery.description: Grants permissions to create a named query

CreatePreparedStatement.name: CreatePreparedStatement
CreatePreparedStatement.description: Grants permissions to create a prepared statement.

CreateWorkGroup.name: CreateWorkGroup
CreateWorkGroup.description: Grants permissions to create a workgroup

DeleteDataCatalog.name: DeleteDataCatalog
DeleteDataCatalog.description: Grants permissions to delete a datacatalog

DeleteNamedQuery.name: DeleteNamedQuery
DeleteNamedQuery.description: Grants permissions to delete a named query specified

DeletePreparedStatement.name: DeletePreparedStatement
DeletePreparedStatement.description: Grants permissions to delete a prepared statement specified.

DeleteWorkGroup.name: DeleteWorkGroup
DeleteWorkGroup.description: Grants permissions to delete a workgroup

GetDataCatalog.name: GetDataCatalog
GetDataCatalog.description: Grants permissions to get a datacatalog

GetDatabase.name: GetDatabase
GetDatabase.description: Grants permissions to get a database for a given datacatalog

GetNamedQuery.name: GetNamedQuery
GetNamedQuery.description: Grants permissions to get information about the specified named query

GetPreparedStatement.name: GetPreparedStatement
GetPreparedStatement.description: Grants permissions to get information about the specified prepared statement.

GetQueryExecution.name: GetQueryExecution
GetQueryExecution.description: Grants permissions to get information about the specified query execution

GetQueryResults.name: GetQueryResults
GetQueryResults.description: Grants permissions to get the query results

GetQueryResultsStream.name: GetQueryResultsStream
GetQueryResultsStream.description: Grants permissions to get the query results stream

GetTableMetadata.name: GetTableMetadata
GetTableMetadata.description: Grants permissions to get a metadata about a table for a given datacatalog

GetWorkGroup.name: GetWorkGroup
GetWorkGroup.description: Grants permissions to get a workgroup

ListDataCatalogs.name: ListDataCatalogs
ListDataCatalogs.description: Grants permissions to return a list of datacatalogs for the specified AWS account

ListDatabases.name: ListDatabases
ListDatabases.description: Grants permissions to return a list of databases for a given datacatalog

ListEngineVersions.name: ListEngineVersions
ListEngineVersions.description:
Grants permissions to return a list of athena engine versions for the specified AWS
                                                account

ListNamedQueries.name: ListNamedQueries
ListNamedQueries.description:
Grants permissions to return a list of named queries in Amazon Athena for the specified
                                                AWS account

ListPreparedStatements.name: ListPreparedStatements
ListPreparedStatements.description: Grants permissions to return a list of prepared statements for the specified workgroup.

ListQueryExecutions.name: ListQueryExecutions
ListQueryExecutions.description: Grants permissions to return a list of query executions for the specified AWS account

ListTableMetadata.name: ListTableMetadata
ListTableMetadata.description: Grants permissions to return a list of table metadata in a database for a given datacatalog

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permissions to return a list of tags for a resource

ListWorkGroups.name: ListWorkGroups
ListWorkGroups.description: Grants permissions to return a list of workgroups for the specified AWS account

StartQueryExecution.name: StartQueryExecution
StartQueryExecution.description: Grants permissions to start a query execution using an SQL query provided as a string

StopQueryExecution.name: StopQueryExecution
StopQueryExecution.description: Grants permissions to stop the specified query execution

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permissions to add a tag to a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permissions to remove a tag from a resource

UpdateDataCatalog.name: UpdateDataCatalog
UpdateDataCatalog.description: Grants permissions to update a datacatalog

UpdatePreparedStatement.name: UpdatePreparedStatement
UpdatePreparedStatement.description: Grants permissions to update a prepared statement.

UpdateWorkGroup.name: UpdateWorkGroup
UpdateWorkGroup.description: Grants permissions to update a workgroup
